title: Jane Birkin, British actress, singer and French icon, dies at 76
description: The London-born star, whose British accent and natural style charmed her adopted country of France, died on Sunday. Her fame rivals the Hermès luxury handbags named after her.

title: Flash floods kill at least 4 people in Pennsylvania as storms sweep the Northeast
description: More than 40 million people across the Northeast were at moderate risk of excessive rainfall on Sunday, according to the National Weather Service.

title: Carlos Alcaraz beats Novak Djokovic to win Wimbledon, his second major trophy
description: It's the first championship at Wimbledon second Grand Slam trophy overall for Carlos Alcaraz. The No. 1-ranked Alcaraz prevented Djokovic from what would have been a record-tying eighth title.

title: Carlee Russell appeared at home after vanishing while reporting lost child
description: Carlee Russell, 25, from Hoover, Ala., went missing on Thursday night after telling 911 she was going to help a toddler stranded on the side of the interstate. She then returned home, police said.

title: A deal that lets Ukraine export grain during its war with Russia is about to expire
description: Russian President Vladimir Putin says a part of the agreement that would have eased similar exports from his country has not been satisfied.

title: Iran's morality police return in a new campaign to impose Islamic dress on women
description: The morality police had largely pulled back following the death of 22-year-old Mahsa Amini last September, as authorities struggled to contain mass protests calling for the overthrow of the theocracy.

title: Lionel Messi makes it official and signs with Inter Miami
description: Lionel Messi has finalized his deal to join Major League Soccer. Inter Miami has landed a global icon.

title: 9 bodies are pulled from a flooded tunnel in South Korea as rains cause flash floods
description: Days of heavy rain triggered flash floods and landslides and destroyed homes across the country. Dozens have died and thousands have been evacuated.

title: Endometriosis, a painful and often overlooked disease, gets attention in a new film
description: 'Below the Belt' highlights patients' stories and the push for new research dollars for this poorly understood disease. Here are 7 surprising facts from the film.

title: A punishing heat wave hits the West and Southwest U.S.
description: A heat wave that's expected to peak this weekend kicked off with record high temperatures and put one-third of Americans under heat alerts.

title: People and pets seek shade and cool as Europe sizzles under a heat wave
description: Fifteen cities in Italy, most of them in the country's center and south, were under heat advisories. Czech temperatures soared to a new record high. European countries father north also sweltered.
